title: Charles Manson - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/10/20
itunes:title: Charles Manson - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/10/20
description:
George Noory and investigative journalist Tom O'Neill explore his fascination with the Manson family murders from 1969, how Charles Manson changed so quickly from a friendly musician to an evil killer, and whether CIA experiments with LSD and mind control could be connected to the crimes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
